name: The House in Fata Morgana: A Requiem for Innocence
description: "A Requiem for Innocence" is a companion to the visual novel "The House in Fata Morgana." It tells the tale of a young man dragged down by his ambitions and a girl both worshiped as a saint and maligned as a witch. For them, there is no happily ever after.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista and newer Processor: Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 800x600 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Pentium III 1.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 Storage: 1 GB available space
